metadata.subject: Catholic Church
Clergy
metadata.title: Lettres /
metadata.creator: B***, Anselmo.
B***, Anselmo
Napoleon I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821
B***, Anselmo. Nouvelle lettre de D. Anselmo B*** ... à Buonaparte ... 1 nov. 1801
France. Directoire exécutif
metadata.description: Title from pt.1, which collates: 23, [1] p
The letters are dated: Embrun, le 18 novembre 1799 -- Valence, le 1er. février 1800

"Extrait des registres des délibérations du Directoire exécutif. Paris, le 14 brumaire de l'an 7 de la République française, une & indivisible [4 novembre 1798]": pt.1, p.[24] With reference to the clergy of France who have not submitted to the law of 7 vendémiaire an IV (29 septembre 1795)

Nouvelle lettre de D. Anselmo B***, ancien historiographe de l'Université de Pavie, à Buonaparte, sur la paix. Valence, le 1 nov. 1801. -- [s.l. : s.n., 1801] -- 22 p. ; 17 cm. -- Caption title. Without imprint
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on cover. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Irregular pagination.
